name: Bingo Cities
description:
Bingo Cities new way to play BINGO, Don't get rushed with, Bingo Cities will give you the most chances to win your cards, with 75 Bingo Balls, that helps you to work your way unto the ultimate BLACKOUT BINGO.
Win your way up hit more BINGO!!! and move up levels and change cities and rooms
-No need to wait for other players.
-Play weather your Online or Offline.
-Bingo CIties anywhere, anytime.
